statements: SELECT * FROM site_visits_and_meetings;
SELECT client_name, location FROM site_visits_and_meetings WHERE visit_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM site_visits_and_meetings WHERE visit_id = 100;
SELECT client_name, purpose FROM site_visits_and_meetings WHERE purpose LIKE '%presentation%';
SELECT visit_id, client_name, location, visit_date FROM site_visits_and_meetings ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM site_visits_and_meetings WHERE client_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT visit_id, client_name, location FROM site_visits_and_meetings WHERE visit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_name, visit_date, purpose FROM site_visits_and_meetings WHERE purpose LIKE '%sales%';
SELECT * FROM site_visits_and_meetings ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, meeting_notes FROM site_visits_and_meetings WHERE location = 'New York' AND purpose LIKE '%presentation%' AND visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM site_visits ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT visit_id, client_id, duration_hrs FROM site_visits WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(*) as visit_count FROM site_visits GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM site_visits WHERE duration_hrs > 5;
SELECT project_id, SUM(duration_hrs) as total_duration FROM site_visits GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM site_visits WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT visit_date, duration_hrs FROM site_visits WHERE duration_hrs > 5 ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, AVG(duration_hrs) FROM site_visits GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT DISTINCT client_id, count(*) FROM site_visits GROUP BY client_id HAVING count(*) > 2;
SELECT sv.visit_date, cm.meeting_date, cm.meeting_type FROM site_visits sv JOIN client_meetings cm ON sv.client_id = cm.client_id AND sv.project_id = cm.project_id;
SELECT * FROM SiteVisits WHERE visit_id = 1;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM Projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(visit_id) AS num_visits FROM SiteVisits GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM ClientMeetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_description FROM Projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%database%';
SELECT * FROM SiteVisits WHERE visit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_id, project_id, visit_description FROM SiteVisits WHERE visit_id = 12345;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Projects WHERE project_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM ClientMeetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM SiteVisits GROUP BY project_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM site_visits ORDER BY visit_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT client_id, visit_date FROM site_visits WHERE client_id = 3
SELECT visit_id, visit_date, visit_description FROM site_visits WHERE visit_date >= '2022-01-01' AND visit_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT client_id, COUNT(visit_id) AS total_visits FROM site_visits GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_visits > 2
SELECT * FROM site_visits WHERE visit_description LIKE '%positive%'
SELECT * FROM site_visits WHERE client_id = 123 ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT visit_id, visit_date, visit_description FROM site_visits WHERE visit_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT client_id, COUNT(visit_id) AS total_visits FROM site_visits GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_visits > 2;
SELECT * FROM client_meetings WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT client_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS avg_project_duration FROM project_development GROUP BY client_id ORDER BY avg_project_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM site_visits;
SELECT client_id, visit_date, duration_minutes FROM site_visits ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT meeting_id, client_id, meeting_date, meeting_notes FROM client_meetings ORDER BY meeting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM site_visits ORDER BY visit_date DESC, visit_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_phone LIKE '+1%' AND client_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_email, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT meeting_date, meeting_time, meeting_notes FROM client_meetings WHERE client_id = 1 ORDER BY meeting_date DESC, meeting_time DESC LIMIT 5;
